description: The file is a React Native frontend component for a 'Guess the Number' game, including gameplay logic, UI rendering, difficulty selection, leaderboard management, and persistence.

methods.name: randomIntInclusive
methods.description: Generates a random integer between min and max, inclusive.

methods.name: parseGuess
methods.description: Parses and validates a user's guess input, returning an integer or null.

methods.name: attemptLimitReached
methods.description: Checks if the number of attempts has reached the maximum allowed for the current difficulty.

methods.name: startNewGame
methods.description: Initializes and starts a new game with specified difficulty.

methods.name: handleSubmitGuess
methods.description: Handles the guess submission logic, updating attempts, providing hints, and determining game over/win states.

methods.name: handleSaveWin
methods.description: Saves the player's win to the leaderboard if a valid name is provided.

methods.name: handleClearLeaderboard
methods.description: Clears all stored leaderboard entries after user confirmation.
